entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 5:30 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Temperature: 11.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 8.5°C
Wind: NE 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low plus 5 except plus 2 in low lying inland areas. Patchy frost.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5 except plus 2 in low lying inland areas. Patchy frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 12 with temperature rising to 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning in the evening. Fog patches overnight. Amount 2 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low 12 with temperature rising to 17 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016
